summary: Buen Retiro Park in Madrid is a serene retreat spanning 350 acres, ideal for peace and quiet amidst royal gardens. Activities include boating and art exhibitions, making it a must-visit spot. Located at Plaza de la Independencia 7, 28001 Madrid. Open from April to September, 6 am to midnight, and October to March, 6 am to 10 pm. Entry is free.

summary: Royal Palace of Madrid was built on the site of the Moorish Castle destroyed in 1734 by fire. It's a main aspect of Madrid Spain sightseeing, surrounded by old city walls. Location: Calle de Bailén, 28071 Madrid. Timings: April to September 10 am to 8 pm; October to March 10 am to 6 pm. Entry Fee: 15 Euros or INR 1125 with a guide, 11 Euros or INR 825 without a guide, 6 Euros or INR 450 for senior citizens, students, and free for kids below 5 years.
